page.title: 09Playground games- Juniors
page.content: {JUNIORS}games are a bit different, a lot of the boys play football, rounders and cricket. I think elastic games are the most popular game for girls in our school at the moment. The elastic game is played with 3-4 people, 2 are standing inside a long piece of elastic, and the other person has to jump up, down, in, and out of the elastic. This game is called England, Ireland. The game gets harder by adjusting the elastic higher. Poisoned well is a game where you stand around a circle holding hands with a group of friends, and keep turning around. The object of the game is to try to pull the other people in, but to keep out yourself.
